requests.name: Portable aircon
requests.description: Client is a young parent, married with 2 young children (M5,F1) and is currently pregnant with her 3rd child. Due to Covid-19, client's husband is having difficulty finding a job. Client suffers from depression and having a hard time caregiving with daughter who has heart problems. She hopes that having portable aircon will allow her children to sleep better.

requests.name: Television
requests.description:
Client is a 50 year old male living in a 2 room rental flat. He has major depression and is faced with financial challenges as he is medically unfit for work. He hopes to purchase a television but have financial difficulty in affording it. 

He hopes that with some entertainment at home, he may keep himself engaged on days when negative emotions become overwhelming, thus allowing some rest from negative and difficult thoughts.

requests.name: Washing machine
requests.description: A family with a teenage child needs a washing machine as their existing one has broken down. It is challenging for the family to save up for a new washing machine. The family would like support from the donor to cover transport. Thank you.

requests.name: Television
requests.description: Client has recently been released from prison. She is trying to created healthy routines for herself and her children. Family's old television has spoilt, and client would like to request for another television so that she can keep up with the news, as well as provide some entertainment for children since they are staying home more often due to the pandemic. Your assistance is appreciated!

contact.org: Care Corner Family Service Centre - Tampines
contact.name: Yvette Lau

requests.name: Washing Machine
requests.description: Family of 6 (with 4 young children) is unable to replace washing machine that has broken down unexpectedly. Parents' employment have been impacted by the heightened alert measures. Parents are now hand-washing clothes while caring for 4 young children (2 are under 2 years old). Having a working washing machine will allow parents to better attend to their children's needs.

requests.name: 40L Oven
requests.description:
THK Pan-Disability Centre is a Sheltered Workshop for adults with special need. They are trained with basic duties such as housekeeping and baking, in hopes that they are able to attain jobs in the open job market. 
To support our clients in the baking track, we will require 3×40L Oven that have been lightly use. 
Please let us know your preferred methods of collection/delivery. Thank you.

requests.name: Television
requests.description: Client is a 75 year old elderly, living in a 3 room HDB flat. Client’s husband has passed away and client has been living alone ever since. Client is seeking for a television to occupy her time and feel less isolated at home. For further liaison, do contact Nurul via whatsapp at 98598767 from Monday – Friday 9am – 5pm. Thank you.

requests.name: Gas Stove
requests.description: Client is living with her husband and 3 children, and have another child on the way. The family are struggling financially and have unstable employment. After a long stay in the hospital, her physical condition has deteriorated affecting her ability to cope with her daily activities of livings. 
Please consider to cover the installation costs of the washing machine and water pipe as well. Thank you.

requests.description: We are requesting for a client who would need an oven as she is learning to bake on her free time, and hopes to eventually set up her own homebased business in the long term. She suffers from a genetic heart condition and is currently waiting to get a job as she was recently deemed fit for work. SSO has been supporting her financially in the meantime.

Freezer

requests.name: Mountain Bicycle
requests.description: The client is a person with mental health concerns, he needs to engage on activity to reduce stress and anxiety. This is one of the way he could release trapped condition. Seeking a kind donor to support the client.

requests.name: 4-wheeled Mobility Scooter
requests.description: Elderly grandmother has multiple health issues and is unfit for work. She requires a 4-wheeled Mobility Scooter to get around and is hoping to get a secondhand one in good condition.

requests.name: 4 wheeled Mobility Scooter
requests.description:
Client is a 51yo man who has Parkinson's Disease and recently suffered a stroke. As a result of his medical illnesses, wife is currently the solebreadwinner for the family of 7 (3 children and 2 elderly parents). 
In a bid to alleviate some of wife's burden, client is currently looking for jobs and if successful, would require a 4-wheel mobility scooter to travel to work.

requests.name: Motorised Scooter
requests.description:
Client is a cancer patient and staying alone. Client has some mobility issues. Thus, having a motorised scooter will allow client to go about his daily activities.

Note: Client can only use a motorised scooter that is able to support 100-150kg   in weight.

requests.name: electric wheelchair
requests.description:
client is requesting for an electric wheelchair due to mobility issues.
 

He recently developed a condition where all his bones are fusing together starting with his legs, and requires a wheelchair to get around. As he is losing mobility in his hands as well, an electric wheelchair would be more appropriate.

requests.name: Motorized Wheelchair Needed for Elderly Client!
requests.description: Client is an elderly woman with limited mobility. She is presently residing alone and is dependent on others when she utilizes her manual wheelchair. The motorized wheelchair will help her to regain her personal independence and enable her to fulfil her day-to-day needs and errands with more ease.

requests.name: Mobility Scooter
requests.description:
Client, 49F, works as a Grabfood deliverer. She is a divorcee and has two children living with her, aged 20M and 16F. She has been using a second-hand mobility scooter with faulty brakes, which has posed as a physical safety concern for her. She suffers from eroded knee joint cartilage on both knees which had been impacted from having to use her legs to control the speed when slowing down. She is also diagnosed with asthma/chronic obstructive pulmonary disease and is on regular inhalers. She gets short of breath when she walks long distances and hence, is heavily reliant on her mobility scooter. 

Client is looking for a replacement mobility scooter that has working brakes. She is open to having a second-hand one as well.

contact.org: Care Corner Family Service Centre - Toa Payoh
contact.name: Merissa Boh

requests.name: Motorize wheelchair
requests.description: Client is an elderly man with diabetes. Due to water retention he is not able to walk very well. His elderly wife is unable to push him on a wheelchair, and he has a frozen shoulder, making it difficult to wheel himself. As such, he would like to request for a motorized wheelchair so he can move around more easily

Client receives milk powder rations for 1 year old toddler but milk powder is not suitable for him and causes him to have diarrhoea. Thus, client hopes to get the suitable milk powder (S26 brand Stage 3) for her youngest grandchild.

requests.description: The family is in need of a laptop for Home-based learning. No brand specific, accept both new and second-hand laptop as long as it is in good working condition. Installed with Microsoft Office (word/excel/PowerPoint) for project works. The item will be directly sent to beneficiary's home and please contact us for delivery details. Thank you!

requests.name: Bacteria and virus disinfectant spray
requests.description: Sunbeam Place @ Children's Society is currently in need the following items for the kids' activities: Bacteria and virus disinfectant spray; Yoga pants(size S,M,L and XL);Sports shoes for girls(size 36,37,39,40 and 42); Shoe box; Sport bra for girls(size XXL and XXXL); Vertical whiteboard with rolling stand; Locked Cabinet for storage. Please contact us for the quantities needed and the delivery details. Thank you!

requests.name: TENA L PANTS ADULT DIAPERS
requests.description: Client is diagnosed with Rectal Cancer and living alone. Client is financially needy and requires the use of diapers as client experiences incontinence.

requests.name: 40 X 227g Anchor pure New Zealand unsalted block butter
requests.description: We are requesting for 40 slabs of 227g of Anchor Pure New Zealand unsalted block butter for our house baking. This is part of the work therapy provided at The Helping Hand. The Helping Hand is a Voluntary Welfare Organization affiliated with the National Council of Social Service. We run a home providing drug rehabilitation and after-care services to male drug addicts and ex-offenders in Singapore. This is a residential programme carried out in our agency home, which was graciously provided by the Singapore government in recognition of our services to the community. We have a total of about 100 residents and staff staying in at our premise.

requests.name: Washing machine (6.5kg top load)
requests.description:
A young couple with children requires assistance to adjust after both their release from incarceration. They are in the midst of stabilizing in gainful employment. They lack financial resources to replace their faulty washing machine.
Donation of the washing machine will help them in reducing their household chore load.

contact.org: Fei Yue Family Service Centre @ Champions Way
contact.name: Joycelyn Wong

requests.name: Laptop (2nd hand)
requests.description: Client is a 64yo single seeking employment. Strained relationship with family members. currently requires a laptop to navigate job portals and government websites as well as for writing resumes.

requests.name: Laptop (2nd hand)
requests.description: Client is a 64yo single seeking employment. Strained relationship with family members. currently requires a laptop to navigate job portals and government websites as well as for writing resumes.

requests.name: Halal fresh/frozen food assistance for 3 to 6 months
requests.description: A sole breadwinner with 9 children, has been experiencing there is still insufficient food supply (halal fresh/frozen food) due to the large family. Interested donor, please contact worker at shiyan@frcsfsc.sg or 8554-8219. Thank you very much!

requests.name: Ensure milk
requests.description: A client with a physical disability needs a carton of Ensure milk powder for daily feed in a month.

requests.name: Stage 1 Milk Formula
requests.description: Please contact Social Worker Jimmy at jimmygoh@thkmc.org.sg or 8718 8444 to liaise. Family living in public rental housing and facing financial crisis is seeking support for Stage 1 milk-formula for their newborn expected to be delivered in early to mid-July 2021.

contact.org: THK Family Service Centre @ Tanjong Pagar
contact.name: Navarraj

requests.name: Adult diapers(Tena) pull up L Size (6 packets)
requests.description:
Client (53/F) is a divorcee who lives at a HDB 1 room rental flat. Client is unemployed due to her multiple medical conditions(slip disc, hearing impairment, hepatitis C, chronic migraines, asthma) that require ongoing treatment.  Client also has Crohn's disease that affect client's bowel movement. Client is required to be on adult diapers and lady pads. Client would appreciate the donation of adult diapers and lady pads to aid her in her daily activities.


To note: Email/WhatsApp message @ 66901010, & donor will be shortlisted. Thank you.

contact.org: Fei Yue Family Service Centre @ Champions Way
contact.name: Joycelyn Wong

requests.name: Wardrobe and Shoe Rack
requests.description: Family has 3 children aged 2y, 1y and 5m old. They are low-income and husband recently began new job. They will benefit from wardrobe for their kids and shoe rack.

contact.org: Care Corner Family Service Centre - Queenstown
contact.name: Esther Benert

requests.name: Wall-Mounted Kitchen Cabinet or Shelf
requests.description: Family of 6 is living in a rental flat with 4 school-going children, and experiences challenges related to finances, system barrier, and living condition. Current kitchen shelf is not in usable condition. The mother has a small home-based cooking business and a kitchen cabinet or shelf will be useful in organising her kitchen space. Anyone who is keen to donate to this family can reach me directly for more details. Thank you!

requests.name: Cupboard with 4 rectangle drawers for folded clothes
requests.description: Family of 9, with 7 children below 10 YO, requires a cupboard with drawers to place the children’s folded clothes. The client's spouse is not able to work due to medical issues, causing the family to lose a substantial amount of income. Family now depends on client's income as the sole breadwinner. The donation will greatly reduce the financial stress on the couple. Item to be delivered directly to client’s house.

requests.name: QuickVue At-Home OTC COVID-19 Test (25 Tests/Kit)
requests.description:
In line with the present COVID-19 situation, our organisation, The Helping Hand has added layer of ringfencing to help to identify cases and prevent further transmission, we have started conducting mandatory Covid-19 testing to all residents and staff since 15th July 2021.
The Helping Hand is a Voluntary Welfare Organization affiliated with the National Council of Social Service. We run a home providing drug rehabilitation and after-care services to male drug addicts and ex-offenders in Singapore. This is a residential programme carried out in our agency home, which was graciously provided by the Singapore government in recognition of our services to the community. 
We have a total of about 100 residents and staff staying in at our premise. We are using the QuickVue At-Home OTC COVID-19 Test (25 Tests/Kit).

Here is the link for the requested item, thank you for your kindness.

https://www.guardian.com.sg/quickvue-at-home-otc-covid-19-test-25-tests-kit/p/619909

requests.name: Size XL Diapers (Tape)
requests.description: Client is a cancer patient on palliative care. She has been bed-ridden for the past few months and requires full-time caregiving. Her husband is the primary caregiver, and he had given up his full-time job to care for the client. The couple depends on social assistance and are frugal in their spending. The client requires diapers and this incur additional expenses for the family. The couple has a son who is in Primary 5.

requests.name: TENA Super XL Pants
requests.description:
Patient is a 42 years old male who is single and living with his elderly mother in a two-room HDB rental flat. His mother is his main caregiver. He requires assistance with his daily activities and is totally dependent. The family does not have any income and is reliant on various assistances for daily subsistence. Thus, the family has difficulty affording the ongoing consumables for patient.

Patient uses TENA Super XL Pants. The item can be found here: https://www.watsons.com.sg/pants-super-adult-diapers-xl-12s/p/BP_57783 (Watsons) or https://www.guardian.com.sg/tena-pants-super-xl-12pcs/p/171935 (Guardian).

Kindly arrange the donated items to be delivered to patient’s house directly. You can WhatsApp Jia Ling at 82479135 for details. Thank you!

requests.name: Tena Pull up diapers (L size) - 3 packs
requests.description: Pt is known to SCS home hospice service and would benefit from assistance for diapers.

requests.name: Desktop or Laptop for HBL
requests.description:
The family have 3 young children who are schooling and is the sole breadwinner of the family. The oldest child is diagnosed with Autism. Mother is the main caregiver to the children. 

Additionally, the family is supporting grandparents financially. Both grandparents are diagnosed with cancer. 

The family is hoping to get a desktop or laptop to support the children's learning needs. 

He is unable to afford it due to massive pay cut due to COVD-19. Mother is unable to gain employment due to caregiving commitments and that she recently miscarried.

offers.name: Hanil UV Steriliser Dryer Cabinet for Baby
offers.description:
Soft-dydraulic door close function is not working anymore but does not affect performance or storage capability. Comes with 3 pin plug.

Comes with good-as-new 2x pacifiers and finger cap brush for baby's teeth & gums.

Premium medical-grade sterilization that kills 99.97% bacteria.100% Made in Korea; P3M HEPA filter (Patented design)
Sterilize with dual UV lamp (OSRAM, Italy) & 100% safe drying with IR halogen lamp (DR FISCHER, France)
Tested by Singapore TUV SUD (PSB), US FDA, Japan JFRL, Korea KCL.

√ Tested by Singapore TUV SUD PSB (Test report 7191125433-CHM15-RC)
√ Used by Thomson Medical Centre parentcraft, nursery wards and premium suites
√ Used by Kinderland (SIngapore) Infant Centres
√ Effectively stores your baby bottles & accessories with deodorization/ventilation effect.
√ 3M HEPA filter blocks away air-borne dust & particles.
√ The compact size saves you kitchen counter-top space.
√ Easy & intutive course settings and design - makes it easy for elderly to use too
√ ideal for a variety of uses even after weaning.

Can also be used to sterilize/store other children items (eg. water bottle, feeding accessories, teether, pacifier, toothbrush, nasal aspirator, comb, toys) and household items (eg. cutlery, dishware, cups, knives, cutting boards, nail clipper, razor).

Efficient & convenient sterilization mode for busy parents.

No need to constantly load water into steam sterilizer or spend time boiling the traditional way & manually dry items on drying rack after boiling. 

UV sterilization uses pulses of UV light that are powerful enough to inactivate microorganisms (germs, bacteria & viruses). UV sterilization is often used in the medical field as it ensures the highest level of disinfection.

Easy maintenance.
No need to regularly use lemon water to descale the deposits that accumulates within electric steam sterilizer machines and around its heating coil. Simply use slightly damp cloth to wipe trays and internal surface areas of sterilizer cabinet, whenever necessary.

Excellent drying function via infrared technology prevents mould accumulation.
Examples where mould tends to occur are: on teat collar, insides of a sippy cup straw, inside rims of a child’s water bottle, breast pump tubing, breast pump valve parts, toothbrush, etc.

Product weight: 4.5kg

offers.description:

- Easy to use, store and bring along: can fit almost any chair, whether with a backrest or not, with harness or not, at the table or using the chair feeding tray; it folds and unfolds fast, cleans up well after messy eating, and you can store utensils and other items in the pockets

- Looks good and saves you from embarrassing messes when eating outside home

offers.name: Maternity and Baby Pillow
offers.description:
The pillow is in good condition as it has been used with care, and sanitised before being packed in the original bag.

10 months of daily use, with minor marks from the Velcro hooks catching onto the fabric once my little one began to explore it.

The cover containing the harness is connected to the pillow and can be inserted in a compartment at the back when not in use. 
UNILOVE 4-in-1 Pillow (Maternity Bolster + Nursing Pillow + Baby Nest with Harness + Cot Liner/Bumper)

The harness is fastened using Velcro, but it's meant to fit loosely. It won't stop a 4-6mo from rolling around, only a newborn who started kicking about.
